attributes.action: Kids go back to school! Reduce holidays!
attributes.additional_details:
Children today have way too much time away from school, reducing the amount of education they recieve and increasing the chances of them becoming involved in anti social behaviour or worse.

My views as a lone parent are that which many will share. I want my children to gain the best education they can within their short years at school.

Why name school advancement in years when it is clear to all that children spend a large portion of the year outside of school.

Lets decrease the holidays and increase the educational developent of our children to an acceptable standard that we can all be proud of.
